title: Lindsey Graham Repeats Call for Russians to Assassinate Putin
sub_head: Russian officials say senator’s comments are unacceptable, as GOP and Democratic lawmakers distance themselves from idea
body:
WASHINGTON—Sen. Lindsey Graham (R., S.C.) doubled down Friday on his call for the Russian people to assassinate or overthrow Russian President Vladimir Putin, even after a backlash from the White House and peers in Congress who said Mr. Graham had gone too far, as well as from Russian officials, who accused him of advocating for terrorism.
“That is not the position of the United States government and certainly not a statement you’d hear come from the mouth of anybody working in this administration,” White House press secretary Jen Psaki said on Friday.
